author: Ben Leubsdorf
title: Mnuchin Says U.S. Willing to Negotiate With China to Avoid Trade War
text:
WASHINGTON—The U.S. is willing to negotiate with China to avoid an all-out trade war, but President Donald Trump is determined to safeguard U.S. interests, Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said Friday.
“On the one hand, we’re willing to continue negotiations,” Mr. Mnuchin said during an interview on CNBC. “On the other hand, the president is absolutely prepared to defend our interests.”
